description: The HpeiLOBackupRestoreService resource describes the properties for using the BMC backup and restore features.

BackupFileLocation.description: The URI to which a client may POST to create and download a file for a subsequent restore operation.

HttpPushUri.description: The URI to which a client may POST a file for a subsequent restore operation.

title: #HpeiLOBackupRestoreService.v2_2_0.HpeiLOBackupRestoreService
